message: Hi - I'll be interviewing Zootool (http://www.zootool.com/) and posting at http://inspiredbeta.com/ next week. I just wondered if anyone has any questions they would like included in the interview such as startup problems, concept, roadmap etc. Reply here or email me (hello inspiredbeta.com) - thanks.
Cool! looking forward for the interview

What I would appreciate is a reminder link when you do get the article done, it's a cool app they? (is it just one guy, or was there a team?) has built. I would like to know how many people were involved, what they had to get help with, what they did one there own.
Thanks guys.  I will definitely post a link here when done :)
I would make sure to grill them on export capability. Having all my bookmarks on somebody's server is great for being accessible from everywhere, but not very useful if they fail as a company.
Hey guys the interview is up: http://inspr.in/7M13
@Aranjedeath good question but we did the interview over the weekend.

I actually tweeted the question at them and they responded
https://twitter.com/#!/zootool/status/77054353130799104
